meanings.sent1: The chicken breast was skinless, making it easier to cook.
meanings.sent2: The skinless apple looked fresh and ready to eat.
meanings.sent3: The skinless banana slipped out of my hand and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: The skinless tomato felt exposed and vulnerable in the salad.
meanings.sent5: The skinless fish fillet was so smooth and delicate.

meanings.sent1: The skinless potato was perfect for making mashed potatoes.
meanings.sent2: The skinless grape was juicy and refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The skinless orange rolled off the table and onto the floor!
meanings.sent4: The skinless peach felt naked without its fuzzy coat.
meanings.sent5: The skinless pear was so smooth and shiny.
